name: HipArthroplastySurgeriesICD10PCS
title: Hip Arthroplasty Surgeries ICD10PCS
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values identifies patients who have a procedure of a hip arthroplasty.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who have a hip arthroplasty procedure.  Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element will map to the Procedure category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Only use codes which represent hip arthroplasty procedures.  Codes used are to be ICD10PCS codes only.),(Exclusion Criteria: None.)
